title: The external stairs shall be constructed of non-combustible materials, and any doorway leading to it shall have the required fire resistance
clause_text: The external stairs shall be constructed of non-combustible materials, and any doorway leading to it shall have the required fire resistance.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
